original_text: For the days shall come upon thee, that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee, and compass thee round, and keep thee in on every side,
korean_text: 날이 이를지라 네 원수들이 토둔을 쌓고 너를 둘러 사면으로 가두고

sentences.original_text: For the days shall come upon thee
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그 날들이 네게 임할 것임이라

sentences.original_text: that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee
sentences.korean_translation: 네 원수들이 너를 둘러 흙을 쌓고

sentences.original_text: and keep thee in on every side
